overview: Power Struggle is an annual professional wrestling event promoted by New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW). The event has been held since 2011 and aired domestically as a regular pay-per-view (PPV) and internationally as an internet pay-per-view (iPPV). The event is held in November and is the final major event before the annual January 4 Dome Show, NJPW's biggest event of the year.
title: NJPW: Power Struggle
